cause.description:
just throw all ur bitch change in a plastic bag, keep doing this for like a long time, then we all put it together and buy some ready mix cement and build a sick small concreat kicker or sumthing. and the city ain't gonna do nothing so we should start to try, we can get like some bags of concrete and mix it with sand or whatevr you have to do for cheap and make one. we have to figure out all the shit like where its gonna be, if you have a nice spot suggest it and yea just type ur ideas on the wall
1. Our Skatepark Sucks
2. We should give this one to the bikers
3. And get a new one for our selves
cause.mission: Get like alot of money for a new park
cause.name: Help get Corner Brook a New skateboard park
